content: this easy beginner friendly farmhouse christmas stocking is so simple to make it consists of simple stitches and is so much fun for the holiday season - great for adding to adding to your decor or filling with homemade cookies & giving as a present this is an easy level crochet pattern and the techniques you will need to know are single_crochet double_crochet increases chain stitch magic_ring and slip_stitch you will also need to know how to sew pieces together and work in the round
